intro_only_event_multi_charizard_login/6:
Let me introduce you to my new partner
Pokémon! This is Charizard!

This is probably the first time you’ve seen it
in this form, isn’t it.

I can’t help but feel excited about all the
new possibilities this will open up for me
and Charizard!

If we end up battling each other, let’s both
do our best!
